Key Match Events: Dilshan Madushanka took a double-wicket maiden in the first over
Mitchell Marsh scored a half-century off 39 balls
David Warner held a brilliant catch to dismiss Pathum Nissanka
Sri Lanka's opening partnership of 125 was a major event
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka captain Kusal Mendis elected to bat first predicting a total of 280-300
Dasun Shanaka was ruled out due to a quad injury, with Kusal Mendis taking the captaincy
Australia and Sri Lanka had a 63-35 head-to-head record in their World Cup meetings
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell expressed confidence in the team's performance
Adam Zampa praised the team's effort and spin bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Lucknow
Sri Lanka's new players Chamika Karunaratne and Lahiru Kumara were included in the XI
